name: LogiTycoon - Transport Game
description:
LogiTycoon challenges you to manage your own transport company. Starting with buying trucks, trailers and hiring the needed amount of employees.

Make sure your employees get enough sleep and upgrade your truckers driving license to accept better freights.

Take care of the maintenance of your trucks and trailers and refuel your trucks on time, so they’re able to drive to their destination.

You can start your headquarter in your own country or choose another one, but choose wisely. Your new trucks and trailers will always be delivered at this location.

If your company gets big enough, you can join a Concern or create one yourself. Communicate with other players and use the Concern freights, projects and fuel stations in your advantage to let your company grow even faster.

LogiTycoon includes:
- Start and manage your own transport company.
- Take care of your employees, trucks and trailers.
- Find the most profitable freights.
- Work together with other players in a Concern.
- Find the best Technician contract for maintenance.
- Hire HR Managers to automate employee aspects of your business.
- Hire Technical Managers to automate maintenance aspects.

Do you have what it takes to make your company the best?
